subject: Re: Order SSN4226 Missing Items From Shipment and Incorrect Item Recieved
description_text:
Hello, I would like to follow up on this ticket. 

Are you able to provide tracking numbers for the missing Hall Handbrake and the Black Plus X Pedals with baseplate?

Thank you for your help,
Tyler

> On Dec 24, 2025, at 17:12, Tyler Young <116young@gmail.com> wrote:
> 
> Will the corrected items (missing black handbrake, correct black color pedals) be shipped promptly? Or will you await a shipping notification from the returned item?

conversations.body_text:
Hello,

I would like to follow up on this request!

Best,
Tyler
ID 为 7545 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单7545  
      主题: Order #SSN4226 - Wrong Color Delivered  
      描述:  Hello!  I have just received my Plus X Pedals with baseplate. Unfortunately the product delivered is the silver color but I had ordered the black version!  Are you able to secure an exchange for the correct color?  It's unfortunate because the shipping must be quite expensive. The pedals are very nice though!  I understand there's a lot of orders right now with Black Friday and the holidays, but thank you for considering my request!   ~Tyler
此工单已关闭并合并到工单 7927 中

Hi Tyler Young,  We sincerely apologize for the delayed response, and we are also very sorry for sending you the wrong color. May I ask if you would be able to accept the silver version? Returning the item would result in it being destroyed, and the shipping and customs fees are extremely high. If you are willing to keep it, we can offer you a compensation in USD as a gesture of our apology.

I see. Thank you for your response, though this is very disheartening. I had selected the black color specifically to fit better in my living space. Are there any other alternatives? It does seem unreasonable to send these back just to be destroyed. I suppose your US distribution is unable to accept returns? The pedals are unused in the original packaging. Thank you for your consideration, Tyler
Hi Tyler Young,  We have urgently arranged an air shipment to replenish inventory, with the shipment expected to arrive at the warehouse on Friday.

That is excellent news! I imagine your US distribution was nearly emptied during the Black Friday sales. What can I expect of this process from here? I will be traveling out of the country starting Friday 19 Dec. is it possible for a corrective shipment to be delivered by then? Best, Tyler

Hello, What are my next steps? I am hoping to receive the correct black colored pedals, but I agree that it would not be good to ship my silver pedals back overseas as it is probably very expensive. Best, Tyler
Hello, I’d like to follow up on this request! I have not received a reply in about a week. Best, Tyler
面向踏板发错颜色
手刹漏发
Hi Tyler Young, We will reship a new package ASAP.

Thank you for your prompt reply!

I appreciate you sending the missing handbrake and corrected pedals color so quickly. 

Let me know what the return instructions for the silver pedals is. They are opened, but unused and in new condition. 

Best,
Tyler Young

>

Hi Tyler Young,    We have sent you a return label. Please return the pedals, but there is no need to return the base plate. Since only one package can be shipped, we appreciate your cooperation and apologize for any inconvenience caused.
Additionally, please take a photo of the defective product for us, including the product label and the shipping label. Thank you!

Thank you. I have received the shipping label. 

Will the corrected items (missing black handbrake, correct black color pedals) be shipped promptly? Or will you await a shipping notification from the returned item?

I will send the package promptly on 04 JAN 26 when I arrive back home from traveling. 

These photos are of
1) the silver color pedals and baseplate delivered
2) the shipping label for the VAM Pro haptics, but missing the handbrake package

I will provide the other requested photos on 04 JAN 26 when I return to my house. 

Thank you, 
Tyler



 

>
ID 号为 7545, 7927 和 8558 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单8558  
      主题: Order SSN4226 Missing Items From Shipment and Incorrect Item Recieved  
      描述:  Hello! 
 
   
 My recent shipment is missing some items.  
 I purchased 
 1x Black Plus X Pedals with Baseplate 
 2x VAM PRO Haptics with Power Supply 
 1x Simsonn Hall Handbrake  
   
 Waybill SF6047110524783 arrived today but only the VAM PRO Haptics were delivered. The Simsonn Hall Handbrake was not included in the shipment. Can you check to see if the handbrake was successfully shipped? I would expect a second tracking number for this item.  
   
 Secondly, the Plus X pedals that were delivered were not the black color that was ordered. The items delivered were silver instead.  I would like to arrange an exchange of this item for the correct color.  
   
 Please let me know what you find about the missing items. 
   
 Thank you,  
 Tyler  :)

Hello, 

Kindly reply a let me know what my next steps are for this exchange and for the missing items from my order. 

I do not want to return the incorrect pedals until I receive shipping confirmations for 
1) the missing black handbrake 
2) the corrected black Plus X pedals and base plate

Unfortunately It has been 25 days since I opened this support ticket without clear response from Simsonn. 

Best,
Tyler

>

Hi Tyler Young,    We apologize for the inconvenience caused. We have already reshipped your order. The black pedals from our US warehouse just arrived today.  https://www.fedex.com/fedextrack/no-results-found?trknbr=887534608492    https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047211583660

Thank you for your kind reply,

I received the correct black Plus X pedals on 04 JAN 2026. The package
arrived in good condition and the pedals are excellent.

The incorrect silver pedals have been shipped back via USPS with the
provided shipping label.

Please let me know if there is any further action required on my part

Best.
Tyler

On Wed, Dec 31, 2025 at 12:19 AM service@simsonn.com
